channel.title: Robert C. Martin on
channel.description: Recent content in Robert C. Martin on

item.title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
item.description: Classic on software development - it changed the way I understood code, and convinced me to always aim for readability and human-optimized code. Its focus on readability and naming really influenced my view on software, and helped me understand better testing.
